constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 4 (Wednesday, January 6, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. GARCIA of Texas:
H.R. 224.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 7: [The Congress shall have
Power . . .] To establish Post Offices and post Roads
[Page H116]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 5302 Galveston Road in Houston, Texas, as the Vanessa Guillén Post Office Building.
